verbs.description: at walmart 400 and 6 hours [V: will] make that shoplifting charge go away the store managers told harrington and other law enforcement representatives that this is a program that walmart uses across the country and it pertains to suspects who pilfered less than 750 worth of merchandise walmart shoplifting patrick harrington ragan dickens
